attributes.action: contact the owners of the 2nd severn crossing and discuss cutting/abolishing tolls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present the cost of a toll is £5.40p as I and many others live in Wales but work in England we have to pay this ammount to get back home.Please also consider the cost to tpt companies that have to pay to deliver goods into Wales.
In these hard econmic times surley a reduction and not increase in tolls is due!!Can the pm tell us when the tolls will be free,as the bridge must have paid for itself by now.
